bgDescription: Verina's prized Morri Pot brims with a delectable blend of freshly grown vegetables and herbs. Her meticulous care and patience in breeding and preparing these ingredients result in a uniquely delicious taste. Through the growth of her plants, she witnesses the beauty of life cycles, and in cooking, she finds joy in the anticipation of harvest.
description: Increases all teammates' ATK by 44%, lasting for 30m. Only effective for your own Resonator in Co-op Mode.
obtainDescription: Increases all teammates' ATK by 44%, lasting for 30m. Only effective for your own Resonator in Co-op Mode.
